subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: On the day that Brendan Ryan returned to the lineup, during a game in which the bullpen blew a two-run lead, the Yankees learned that their closer had a strained flexor mass muscle.
snippet: On the day that Brendan Ryan returned to the lineup, during a game in which the bullpen blew a two-run lead, the Yankees learned that their closer had a strained flexor mass muscle.
